Source code for hub_toolbox.Logging

#!/usr/bin/env python
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

"""
This file is part of the HUB TOOLBOX available at
http://ofai.at/research/impml/projects/hubology.html

import sys, time


[docs]class ConsoleLogging():
    
    @property
    def _current_time(self):
        return time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')
    

[docs]    def message(self, *objs, flush=True):
        print(self._current_time, 'INFO:', *objs)
        if flush:
            sys.stdout.flush()

        

[docs]    def warning(self, *objs, flush=True):
        print(self._current_time, 'WARNING:', *objs, file=sys.stderr)
        if flush:
            sys.stderr.flush()

        

[docs]    def error(self, *objs, flush=True):
        print(self._current_time, 'ERROR:', *objs, file=sys.stderr)
        if flush:
            sys.stderr.flush()

        
if __name__ == '__main__':
    log = ConsoleLogging()
    log.message('This module supplies functions for printing and logging.')
    log.message('Examples:')
    sys.stdout.flush()
    time.sleep(0.01)
    log.warning('This is a warning.')
    log.error('This is an error!')
    sys.stderr.flush()
    time.sleep(0.01)
    log.message('You should have got three messages on stdout and two on stderr.')
